translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで呼ばれてるのかしら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder why we've been called..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったくだ。物騒な話だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed. It's a disturbing matter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、あんたは…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you are..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、恐ろしい事になりまちたわ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it's become something terrifying..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ね、東芝様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right, Toshiba-sama...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ……どんなわくわくがあるのかな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then... I wonder what excitement awaits..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争だけど、前向きな方が良いよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's war, but it's better to be optimistic, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くぅっ……そ、そうでちけど……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kuuh... Y-yeah, that's true...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ……ポピンズも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now... Poppins too,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他に恥じぬよう、堂々と構えねばな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must stand proudly, with nothing to be ashamed of."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ……儂に任せろ路線と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmm... the 'leave it to me' route,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうダメだから残り日数でできる事をー路線……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or the 'it's already hopeless so let's do what we can in the remaining days' route...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちがいいかのう、三菱」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Which one would be better, Mitsubishi?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「余に聞くなッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't ask me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は、ぼんやりと視線を落としたまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro, with a vacant gaze downward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右手を握っては開き、握っては開いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was repeatedly clenching and unclenching his right hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……健太郎君？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Kentaro-kun?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……ごめんね、日光さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... sorry, Hikkou-san."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何か……何かに、集中してないと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I don't... focus on something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか、飛び出して行っちゃいそうでさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I might just bolt out somewhere."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「良くないよね、そういうの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's not good, is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなで一緒に、行かなくちゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We all have to go together..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我慢我慢……うん、我慢……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Patience, patience... yes, patience..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は飽きることなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro, without losing focus,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手の開閉を繰り返していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: kept repeating the opening and closing of his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし貴様ら、集まったな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, you guys, gathered here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが玉座から起ち上がり、声を張り上げると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stood up from his throne and raised his voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一同は話すのと動くのを止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and everyone stopped talking and moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあウルザちゃん、頼む」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, Urza-chan, please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。それでは総統に代わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Now, on behalf of the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明をさせて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will give you the explanation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの脇に控えていたウルザが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza, who had been standing by Rance's side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一歩前に進み出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stepped forward one step.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、現在の状況ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, regarding the current situation..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統閣下と皆さんの尽力のおかげで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to His Excellency the Supreme Commander and everyone's efforts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何体もの魔人を撃破。そして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have defeated numerous demons. And,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の中継基地であるシャングリラも陥落」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demonic army's relay base, Shangri-La, has also fallen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本拠地である総統府……ランス城の位置が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although the location of the headquarters—the Supreme Command Office... Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 把握されてしまいましたが、パットンさんたちが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has been discovered, Patton-san and others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もたらした聖魔教団の遺産により、こうして浮上」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have brought the heritage of the Holy Demon Cult, which has allowed us to surface like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵主力の攻撃は避ける事が可能となり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are now able to avoid attacks from the enemy's main forces,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵飛行部隊だけの攻撃は防げています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have been defending successfully against attacks by only the enemy's air units."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでの戦歴をかたられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As the history of battles up to now was told,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんのりと雰囲気が軽くなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the atmosphere lightened slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡と言っていいほどの戦果だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The results were almost miraculous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザは、一度言葉を切った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza paused her words once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「首脳の皆さんは承知と思いますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I believe the leaders are aware, but..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, you guys, gathered here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。それでは総統に代わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Now, on behalf of the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明をさせて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will give you the explanation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの脇に控えていたウルザが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza, who had been standing by Rance's side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一歩前に進み出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stepped forward one step.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、現在の状況ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, regarding the current situation..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統閣下と皆さんの尽力のおかげで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to His Excellency the Supreme Commander and everyone's efforts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何体もの魔人を撃破。そして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have defeated numerous demons. And,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の中継基地であるシャングリラも陥落」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demonic army's relay base, Shangri-La, has also fallen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本拠地である総統府……ランス城の位置が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although the location of the headquarters—the Supreme Command Office... Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 把握されてしまいましたが、パットンさんたちが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has been discovered, Patton-san and others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もたらした聖魔教団の遺産により、こうして浮上」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have brought the heritage of the Holy Demon Cult, which has allowed us to surface like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵主力の攻撃は避ける事が可能となり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are now able to avoid attacks from the enemy's main forces,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵飛行部隊だけの攻撃は防げています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have been defending successfully against attacks by only the enemy's air units."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでの戦歴をかたられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As the history of battles up to now was told,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんのりと雰囲気が軽くなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the atmosphere lightened slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡と言っていいほどの戦果だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The results were almost miraculous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザは、一度言葉を切った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza paused her words once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「首脳の皆さんは承知と思いますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I believe the leaders are aware, but..."
